targets.query: select release,  promo_name, distro, latest_build_date, promotion_details, aggregate_hash from "dlrn-promotion" where ("promo_name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'centos-8' AND "release" = 'ussuri')

panels.title: ussuri Components: Days since last promotion

panels.description: List of the latest component jobs

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'component' AND "release" = 'ussuri' AND "component" = 'baremetal') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Baremetal Component

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for ussuri. Default time is the last 2 weeks.
